title: Commending the Saugerties Public Library upon the occasion of hosting its dedication ceremony for the completion of its expansion and restoration project
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE RESOLUTION commending the Saugerties Public Library upon the
occasion  of  hosting its dedication  ceremony for the completion of its
expansion and restoration project

WHEREAS, It is the sense of this Legislative Body to recognize that  the
quality  and character of life in the communities across the great State
of New York  is  reflective  of  certain  exemplary  institutions  whose
purpose is dedicated to serving the community and the needs of its citi-
zenry; and
  WHEREAS,  The  success  enjoyed by the Saugerties Public Library is in
direct correlation to the efforts  of  the  many  individuals  who  have
supported the development of the library over the years; and
  WHEREAS,  This Legislative Body is justly proud to commend the Sauger-
ties Public Library upon the occasion of hosting its dedication ceremony
for the completion of its expansion and restoration project, to be cele-
brated on Saturday, January 29, 2011; and
  WHEREAS, This special event is to honor everyone who has assisted  and
supported  the  library  through  the  transition  of  temporarily being
located at the Town Hall building, as well  as  its  move  back  to  its
original site; and
  WHEREAS,  The  Saugerties  Public  Library expanded its facility at 91
Washington Avenue from 8,365 square feet to 13,162 square feet; it  will
offer  a  new  street-level entrance to the main floor, a public meeting
space, an expanded media collection and  a  teen  area  with  collection
space and computer stations, among other amenities; and
  WHEREAS, The library building, which dates to 1915, also has been made
fully accessible with the installation of an elevator; and
  WHEREAS, Ably led by its Executive Director Jessica Gonzalez and root-
ed  in  a proud and distinguished history, the Saugerties Public Library
may take just pride in its purposeful growth, as  it  looks  forward  to
continuing  to serve the educational, cultural and intellectual needs of
the community; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
commend  the  Saugerties Public Library upon the occasion of hosting its
dedication ceremony for the completion of its expansion and  restoration
project; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted  to  Jessica  Gonzalez,  Executive  Director,  Saugerties Public
Library.
